DOC.brief_summary: Two week , Open Label , randomize , bilateral , crossover , 1 week daily wear combination ( lens / disinfect clean system ) .
DOC.brief_title: BIOCLEAN MPS ( Multi-Purpose Solution ) VII Combination With Biofinity Lens : A Two Week Crossover Study
DOC.detailed_description: To determine patient unreactive lens care solution / Biofinity combination . It expect total three visit : V1 ( Initial ) , V2 ( 1 week ) , & V3 ( 2 week ) .
DOC.criteria: Is 18 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported visual exam last two year Has CL ( contact lens ) spherical prescription 0.25D ( Diopters ) 12.00D ( inclusive ) Has less 1.00 D spectacle cylinder eye Is correctable visual acuity 20/20 good eye Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign informed consent letter Is willing comply wear schedule ( least 40hrs per week ) Is willing comply visit schedule Has never wear contact lenses Currently wear rigid gas permeable contact lens Has history achieve comfortable CL ( contact lens ) wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hour per day ) Has CL prescription outside range 0.25D 12.00D Has spectacle cylinder great 0.75D cylinder either eye Has best correct spectacle distant vision worse 20/20 ether eye Has systemic disease affect ocular health Is use systemic topical medication affect ocular health Has ocular pathology sever insufficiency lacrimal secretion Has persistent , clinically significant corneal conjunctival staining Has active neovascularization central corneal scar Is aphakic Is pregnant lactating
